title: Engaging Cognitive Games
summary: As an older adult, I want to play interactive cognitive games so that I can stay mentally active and engaged while having fun.

title: Guided Physical Activity Programs
summary: As an older adult, I want guided physical activity programs that are easy to follow so that I can stay active and manage my arthritis pain while maintaining my independence.

title: Cognitive Activity Progress Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my progress in cognitive activities so that I can stay motivated and see improvements in my mental agility while managing my time effectively.

title: Customization of Activity Difficulty Levels
summary: As an older adult, I want to customize the difficulty levels of cognitive and physical activities so that I can engage in challenges that match my abilities and help me stay active without frustration.

title: Reminders for Physical Exercises
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to perform my physical exercises so that I can stay active and manage my arthritis pain effectively.

title: Motivational Feedback for Activity Participation
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive motivational feedback when I engage in physical activities so that I feel encouraged to stay active and maintain my independence.

title: Social Interaction Through Group Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to recommend group activities and events that I can participate in, so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.

title: Cognitive Health Assessment Tools
summary: As an older adult, I want to use assessment tools for cognitive health so that I can monitor my mental agility and receive tailored activities to keep my mind active.

title: Daily Activity Suggestions
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide personalized suggestions for daily activities that match my interests and abilities so that I can stay socially connected and physically active despite my reduced mobility.

title: Safety Monitoring During Physical Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to monitor my physical activities and alert my family or caregivers if I encounter any difficulties, so that I can stay safe and maintain my independence while exercising.
